data.name: DraftKings Sportsbook
roles: Revamped the sports betting platform using Next.js and TypeScript, resulting in a 35% increase in user retention and 50% faster page load times using Server side rendering
Pioneered a real-time odds calculation system using WebSocket (STOMP), handling 100,000+ concurrent users with 99.99% uptime
Introduced a role-based authentication system using Auth0 and Okta, reducing security incidents by 90% while maintaining compliance
data.description: Leading online sports betting platform that allows users to place wagers on a wide variety of sports and events

data.name: Arcee Cloud
roles: Orchestrated the development of interactive AI model visualization interfaces using React Flow and D3.js, creating intuitive diagrams for machine learning pipelines
Engineered real-time AI model monitoring dashboards that tracked model performance, training metrics, and inference results
Leveraged Open WebUI's comprehensive features including its intuitive Model Builder, RAG integration, multi-model support, and pipeline framework
data.description: Seamlessly Merge, Train, & Deploy your own Small Language Models (SLMs) in a few clicks

data.name: FoxyAI
roles: Established an AI-driven image recognition platform using React, Next.js, and TailwindCSS, increasing user engagement by 200% and reducing bounce rates by 45%
Implemented a sophisticated machine learning pipeline using FastAPI and AWS Lambda, processing 50,000+ images daily with 98% accuracy
Architected migration from monolith to microservices using Docker, Terraform and AWS ECS, reducing dev-ops costs by 60% and improving system scalability
data.description: Specializing in artificial intelligence and computer vision solutions for automated analysis of property

data.name: Microsoft VivaGoals
roles: Revolutionized the front-end architecture using NX monorepos and Vite, improving build times by 70% and developer productivity by 45%
Planned comprehensive testing strategies with Jest and Cypress, achieving 90% test coverage and reducing production bugs by 75%
data.description: Innovative platform designed to streamline goal-setting and performance management across organizations.

data.name: Just A Menu
roles: Crafted a Photoshop-like menu editor using React Konva and Shadcn UI, increasing user satisfaction by 85% and reducing menu creation time by 65%
Built high-performance image processing using AWS Lambda, S3, CloudFront, OpenCV, and Puppeteer optimizing storage costs by 93% with high quality
data.description: Creating stunning Menus with JAM, and update them all instantly from an easy to use online dashboard

data.name: Qardio
roles: Engineered a real-time ECG monitoring system using Angular and Canvas, enabling continuous cardiac data streaming that increased patient monitoring accuracy
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to build a HIPAA-compliant data pipeline using AWS Kinesis, Lambda, and DynamoDB, successfully processing of patient data
data.description: Fully Integrated Remote Patient Monitoring (RPM) and Telehealth Solution
